response.overview: The film chronicles the rise and fall of the world's most feared drug lord Pablo Escobar and his volatile love affair with Colombia's most famous journalist Virginia Vallejo throughout a reign of terror that tore a country apart.
response.tagline: A gangster. A princess. The true story of a most unlikely love affair.
response.title: Loving Pablo

results.name: Loving Pablo l Official US Trailer l In Theaters, On Demand and Digital June 15
